*div1 type="summary"* *p*Minutes of a militia meeting [about Apr. 28, 1826?].*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[*date_mentioned n="04-28-1826">About April 28, 1826?*/date_mentioned*]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Lieut. Alley*/person_mentioned* moved that *person_mentioned*applicants for exemption from Militia*/person_mentioned* duty in consequence of physical inability should apply to a *person_mentioned*company court martial*/person_mentioned* who should decide on the case said decission to be subject to appeal to the *person_mentioned*Battalion court martial*/person_mentioned*—decided that *person_mentioned*applicants */person_mentioned*should apply to the *person_mentioned*company court martials*/person_mentioned* subject to appeal to the*person_mentioned* Battalion court martial*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*decided that *person_mentioned*Andrew Rabb*/person_mentioned* be exempted from Militia duty so long as in the opinion of the *person_mentioned*officersof his company */person_mentioned* he continues in his present ill state of health*person_mentioned*—Alexander Jackson*/person_mentioned* claimed exemption from Militia duty—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Cavena*/person_mentioned* claimed exemption from Militia duty*/p*
*p*decided that *person_mentioned*Jackson*/person_mentioned* be exempt from common company muster duty but not from campain duty when called on to go against an *person_mentioned*enemy*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*decided that *person_mentioned*Cavena */person_mentioned*be exempt from Militia duty so long as in the opinion of his *person_mentioned*company officers */person_mentioned*his leg continues to disable him—*/p*
*p*decided that company Musters shall be held on the *date_mentioned n="04-29-1826">last Saturday April*/date_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="06-24-1826">last Saturday June*/date_mentioned* and last *date_mentioned n="08-26-1826">Saturday in August*/date_mentioned*—The Battalion Muster and drill of *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*to be fixed by the *person_mentioned*Lieut. Col*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Saml M. Williams*/person_mentioned* to be exempt from common Musters so long as he is acting as *person_mentioned*secretary of the Colony*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*decided that the majority of *person_mentioned*Company officers */person_mentioned*shall compose a *person_mentioned*Company court martial*/person_mentioned*— */p* *p*drill Muster *date_mentioned n="06-03-1826">1 Saturday in June*/date_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
